title: دعاء الصباح
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا، وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا، وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka 'ilman nafi'an, wa rizqan tayyiban, wa 'amalan mutaqabbalan
translation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, goodly provision, and acceptable deeds

title: دعاء الرزق
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِي بِحَلَالِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ، وَأَغْنِنِي بِفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ
transliteration: Allahumma akfini bihalalika 'an haramika, wa aghnini bifadlika 'amman siwaka
translation: O Allah, suffice me with what You have allowed instead of what You have forbidden, and make me independent of all others besides You

title: دعاء الهداية
translation: O Allah, guide me and grant me uprightness

title: دعاء الشكر
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
transliteration: Allahumma a'inni 'ala dhikrika wa shukrika wa husni 'ibadatika
translation: O Allah, help me to remember You, to thank You, and to worship You in the best manner

title: دعاء الفرج
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلًا، وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلًا
transliteration: Allahumma la sahla illa ma ja'altahu sahlan, wa anta taj'alul-hazna idha shi'ta sahlan
translation: O Allah, there is no ease except what You make easy, and You make the difficult easy if You wish

title: دعاء الحفظ
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ احْفَظْنِي بِالْإِسْلَامِ قَائِمًا، وَاحْفَظْنِي بِالْإِسْلَامِ قَاعِدًا، وَاحْفَظْنِي بِالْإِسْلَامِ رَاقِدًا
transliteration: Allahumma ihfazni bil-islami qa'iman, wahfazni bil-islami qa'idan, wahfazni bil-islami raqidan
translation: O Allah, protect me with Islam when standing, protect me with Islam when sitting, and protect me with Islam when lying down

title: دعاء التوفيق
arabic: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي
transliteration: Rabbi ishrah li sadri wa yassir li amri
translation: My Lord, expand for me my breast and ease for me my task
